title: T206 Lot For Sale - Most Fair/Good with a Couple Nicer   - SOLD!
author: KODIAK

posts.post_title: T206 Lot For Sale - Most Fair/Good with a Couple Nicer   - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Would like to sell the following T206 cards as one lot.  Asking $425 delivered and insured.  Scans available.  Ungraded cards are all fair to good and will grade. All are Piedmont or Sweet Cap. unless noted.  Please send request to [url]dmjthomps913@att.net[/url]

Schlei catching SGC 30 

Starr SGC 40
 
Boss Schmidt Portrait SGC 20
 
Manning Batting PSA 4 (MK)

McAlleese

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks,
